nodes.text: Gravak'k was an enormous wampa that was under study by the droids of the Gray Secant research vessel. It was contained in a cave on the planet Ilum until it was released and slain.
Gravak'k appears as one of the World Bosses that are added to the planet Ilum during the Relics of Gree, a recurring World Event in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
